\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{cache.firstlevel.type}
\label{configuration:CacheFirstlevelType}
\ClearAPI
Defines the type of the first-level cache. Valid values are "DEFAULT", "PROTOTYPE", "SINGLETON" and "THREAD\_LOCAL".
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE - DO NOT EDIT

	\endhead

		\prettyref{module:Cache} \\
	\hline
\end{longtable}
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{com.koch.ambeth.cache.config.CacheConfigurationConstants.FirstLevelCacheType}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{cache.firstlevel.type}}]
cache.firstlevel.type=DEFAULT
\end{lstlisting}
